title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer tried multiple password resets but still can't log in.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Payment via Visa ending 1234 keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Download button is visible but clicking does nothing on billing page.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Updated address not reflected on invoices; still shows old address.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening on Android 13.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Refund requested two weeks ago but amount not received yet.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: User not receiving 2FA codes on registered phone number.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Upload shows 'failed' error on large images; smaller ones also fail.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Wants to enable auto-renewal but toggle is disabled in settings.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Order placed successfully but no confirmation email received.

title: Coupon Not Applying at Checkout
description: Valid coupon shows 'expired' message for multiple users.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: Dashboard takes over 15 seconds to load during peak hours.

title: Shipping Address Not Saved
description: Address form resets after clicking 'Save & Continue'.

title: Export to CSV Produces Empty File
description: Report export returns an empty CSV despite visible data.
